title: Our Services - MUIH
description: To help students reach their maximized potential, we provide a tailored approach to help students address barriers to success as well as support of resilience in the areas in which the student is experiencing success. Utilizing motivational interviewing, we assist students with the following (and more!): Time Management Learning Retention Test and Presentation Anxiety Study/Notetaking [...]
cleaned_text: To help students reach their maximized potential, we provide a tailored approach to help students address barriers to success as well as support of resilience in the areas in which the student is experiencing success. Utilizing motivational interviewing, we assist students with the following (and more!): - Time Management - Learning Retention - Test and Presentation Anxiety - Study/Notetaking Skills - Writing and Research - Tutoring (organic chemistry, research literacy, and physiology) - Accessibility and Disability Support Service - Navigation of MUIH and Community Resources
